segments.text: This kitchen scene is quite a spectacle, if you look closely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The details are really telling a story here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is simply drying a plate, completely engrossed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then you notice the water, flowing endlessly from the sink!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a continuous sheet, just cascading onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she be so utterly unaware of the growing puddle?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids are causing trouble behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's posture on that stool is just terrible, it's so wobbly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are absolutely going to get caught, or worse, fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost comical in its impending doom, but still unsettling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer lack of awareness from the adult is truly astounding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a mess this is all going to become very soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe no one is noticing these obvious hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR
